results.title: All About Evil
results.brief_description: Deborah quickly cultivates a rabid legion of San Franciscan gore fans who help catapult her to new-found local celebrity.

constellations_other.name: Splicing history and silencing the lambs
constellations_other.description: With plastic strips coated with light-sensitive emulsions, film strips captured light and created moving pictures. In this Constellation we trace celluloid and splicing as plot device to serial killers, secrets agents and Super 8.

results.description: Deborah quickly cultivates a rabid legion of San Franciscan gore fans who help catapult her to new-found local celebrity— business booms so quickly, she’s forced to bring on a full film crew of like-minded misfits to meet the demand! Her adoring public, and even her biggest fan— high school student Steven— don’t realize that the murders in the movies are all too real. But will this brooding youth catch the blame as Deborah’s steady stream of ‘actors’ keep disappearing at an ever-quickening pace? What grisly fate awaits those that dare enter the Victoria theatre? Find out in ALL ABOUT EVIL!
description_for_label: Deborah quickly cultivates a rabid legion of San Franciscan gore fans who help catapult her to new-found local celebrity— business booms so quickly, she’s forced to bring on a full film crew of like-minded misfits to meet the demand! Her adoring public, and even her biggest fan— high school student Steven— don’t realize that the murders in the movies are all too real. But will this brooding youth catch the blame as Deborah’s steady stream of ‘actors’ keep disappearing at an ever-quickening pace? What grisly fate awaits those that dare enter the Victoria theatre? Find out in ALL ABOUT EVIL!

results.title: Aliens of the Deep
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Walden Media, James Cameron, Steven Quale and Andrew Wight
results.brief_description: James Cameron teams up with NASA scientists to explore the Mid-Ocean Ridge, a submerged chain of mountains that band the Earth and are home to some of the planet’s most unique life forms.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Pictures, Walden Media, James Cameron, Steven Quale and Andrew Wight
results.description: James Cameron teams up with NASA scientists to explore the Mid-Ocean Ridge, a submerged chain of mountains that band the Earth and are home to some of the planet’s most unique life forms.

results.title: Aliens
results.creator_credit: Brandywine Productions, SLM Production Group, 20th Century Fox, David Giler, Gale Anne Hurd, James Cameron, Peter Lamont, Walter Hill and Emma Porteous
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1986
results.brief_description: When Ripley’s lifepod is found by a salvage crew over 50 years later, she finds that terra-formers are on the very planet they found the alien species. When the company sends a family of colonists out to investigate her story—all contact is lost with the planet and colonists. They enlist Ripley and the colonial marines to return and search for answers.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

results.title: Alien: Covenant
results.creator_credit: Scott Free Productions, Brandywine Productions, TSG Entertainment, 20th Century Fox, Chris Seagers, Mark Huffam, Michael Schaefer, John Logan, Janty Yates, Ridley Scott, Michael Green, Jack Paglen, David Giler, Walter Hill, Dante Harper and Michael Furniss
results.headline_credit: Australia, Canada, New Zealand, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2017
results.brief_description: Bound for a remote planet on the far side of the galaxy, the crew of the colony ship ‘Covenant’ discovers what is thought to be an uncharted paradise, but is actually a dark, dangerous world—which has a sole inhabitant: the ‘synthetic’, David, survivor of the doomed Prometheus expedition.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Scott Free Productions, Brandywine Productions, TSG Entertainment, 20th Century Fox, Chris Seagers, Mark Huffam, Michael Schaefer, John Logan, Janty Yates, Ridley Scott, Michael Green, Jack Paglen, David Giler, Walter Hill, Dante Harper and Michael Furniss

video_links.name: Alien: Covenant | Official Trailer [HD] | 20th Century FOX

results.title: Alias
results.brief_description: Sydney Bristow, an agent who has been tricked to believe she is working for the U.S. government, is actually working for a criminal organization named the Alliance of Twelve. Upon learning this, Sydney becomes a double agent for the real CIA.

constellations_other.name: Splicing history and silencing the lambs
constellations_other.description: With plastic strips coated with light-sensitive emulsions, film strips captured light and created moving pictures. In this Constellation we trace celluloid and splicing as plot device to serial killers, secrets agents and Super 8.

results.description: Sydney Bristow, an agent who has been tricked to believe she is working for the U.S. government, is actually working for a criminal organization named the Alliance of Twelve. Upon learning this, Sydney becomes a double agent for the real CIA.

results.title: Airplane!
results.creator_credit: Chris Casady, Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Peter Kuran, Max W. Anderson, Jerry Zucker, Jamie Shourt and Bill Hedge
results.brief_description: Alcoholic pilot, Ted Striker has developed a fear of flying due to wartime trauma, but nevertheless boards a passenger jet in an attempt to woo back his stewardess girlfriend. Food poisoning decimates the passengers and crew, leaving it up to Striker to land the plane.

constellations_other.name: Atari’s Basketball
constellations_other.description: Released in 1979, just in time for the arcade heydays of the early 1980s, Atari’s Basketball was the first basketball game to use a trackball as the input mechanic and a 45-degree angled side view. This set the standard for basketball games that followed.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Chris Casady, Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Peter Kuran, Max W. Anderson, Jerry Zucker, Jamie Shourt and Bill Hedge
results.description: The persons and events in this film are fictitious - fortunately! A masterpiece of off-the-wall comedy, Airplane! features Robert Hays as an ex-fighter pilot forced to take over the controls of an airliner when the flight crew succumbs to food poisoning; Julie Hagerty as his girlfriend/stewardess/co-pilot; and a cast of all-stars including Robert Stack, Lloyd Bridges, Peter Graves, Leslie Nielsen, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar… and more. Their hilarious high jinks spoof airplane disaster flicks, religious zealots, television commercials, romantic love… the list whirls by in rapid succession. And the story races from one moment of zany fun to the next.
description_for_label: The persons and events in this film are fictitious - fortunately! A masterpiece of off-the-wall comedy, Airplane! features Robert Hays as an ex-fighter pilot forced to take over the controls of an airliner when the flight crew succumbs to food poisoning; Julie Hagerty as his girlfriend/stewardess/co-pilot; and a cast of all-stars including Robert Stack, Lloyd Bridges, Peter Graves, Leslie Nielsen, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar… and more. Their hilarious high jinks spoof airplane disaster flicks, religious zealots, television commercials, romantic love… the list whirls by in rapid succession. And the story races from one moment of zany fun to the next.

results.title: Ai Weiwei: Never Sorry
results.creator_credit: Expressions United Media, MUSE Film and Television, Never Sorry, Adam Schlesinger and Alison Klayman
results.brief_description: Director Alison Klayman chronicles the complexities of Ai Wei Wei’s life for three years, beginning with his rise to public prominence via blog and Twitter after he questioned the deaths of more than 5,000 students in the 2008 Sichuan earthquake.

constellations_other.name: The Family Law
constellations_other.description: An exploration of Asian representation on screens around the world that delves into TV, cinema, documentaries and Disney princesses.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Expressions United Media, MUSE Film and Television, Never Sorry, Adam Schlesinger and Alison Klayman
results.description: An account of the many tribulations that Chinese artist Ai Weiwei, known for his subversive art and political activism, endured between 2008 and 2011, from his rise to world fame via the Internet to his highly publicized arrest due to his frequent and daring confrontations with the Chinese authorities.
description_for_label: An account of the many tribulations that Chinese artist Ai Weiwei, known for his subversive art and political activism, endured between 2008 and 2011, from his rise to world fame via the Internet to his highly publicized arrest due to his frequent and daring confrontations with the Chinese authorities.

results.title: A Visit to the Seaside
results.brief_description: The first successful motion picture in the Kinemacolor system, this eight minute short from George Albert Smith showed people in Brighton, England doing everyday activities. Kinemacolor later influenced and was then replaced by Technicolor.

constellations_other.name: Evolution of colour
constellations_other.description: From stenciling film frames through to the survival of Technicolor after Hollywood stopped using it, this Constellation links early cinema to some of the world's greatest films.

results.description: The first successful motion picture in natural color, filmed with Kinemacolor. It is an 8 minute short film directed by George Albert Smith of Brighton, showing people doing everyday activities. It is ranked of high historical importance. Kinemacolor later influenced and replaced by Technicolor, which was used from 1916 to 1952.
description_for_label: The first successful motion picture in natural color, filmed with Kinemacolor. It is an 8 minute short film directed by George Albert Smith of Brighton, showing people doing everyday activities. It is ranked of high historical importance. Kinemacolor later influenced and replaced by Technicolor, which was used from 1916 to 1952.

results.title: A Trip to the Moon
results.brief_description: Professor Barbenfouillis and five of his colleagues from the Academy of Astronomy travel to the Moon aboard a rocket propelled by a giant cannon. Once on the lunar surface, the bold explorers face the many perils hidden in the caves of the mysterious satellite.

constellations_other.name: Innovation, technology and design: Edweard Muybridge
constellations_other.description: A focus on the discovery, inspiration and innovation at the heart of moving image history

results.description: Professor Barbenfouillis and five of his colleagues from the Academy of Astronomy travel to the Moon aboard a rocket propelled by a giant cannon. Once on the lunar surface, the bold explorers face the many perils hidden in the caves of the mysterious satellite.

results.title: A Star Is Born
results.brief_description: A movie star helps a young singer/actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.
results.description: A movie star helps a young singer/actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.
